scholarship_details.name: Eiffel Excellence Scholarship Programme
scholarship_details.eligibility: Be less than 29 years old on January 1st of the year of application, Be a non-French citizen and not a resident in France, Hold a Master's degree or be enrolled in the final year of a Master's degree at the time of application
scholarship_details.funding_type: Full funding, including monthly stipend, return airfare, accommodation, health insurance, and cultural activities allowance
scholarship_details.application_process: Create an account on the Campus France website, Complete the online application form, Upload required documents, including transcripts, CV, and proof of language proficiency, Submit your application before the deadline
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Checked the official Campus France website, Reviewed the scholarship guidelines, Searched for news and reviews about the scholarship
scholarship_details.verification_notes: The Eiffel Excellence Scholarship Programme is a highly competitive scholarship offered by the French government to attract top international students to study in France. The scholarship is awarded based on academic excellence, leadership potential, and commitment to Franco-foreign cooperation.

scholarship_details.name: Gates Cambridge Scholarships
scholarship_details.amount: Full funding, including tuition fees, college fees, maintenance allowance, and one return airfare
scholarship_details.eligibility: Be a citizen of a country outside the United Kingdom, Have an outstanding academic record, Be committed to improving the lives of others
scholarship_details.duration: Full-time for the duration of your course
scholarship_details.application_process: Create an account on the Gates Cambridge website, Complete the online application form, Upload required documents, including transcripts, CV, and letters of recommendation, Submit your application before the deadline
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Checked the official Gates Cambridge website, Reviewed the scholarship guidelines, Searched for news and reviews about the scholarship
scholarship_details.verification_notes: The Gates Cambridge Scholarships are highly prestigious scholarships offered by the Gates Cambridge Trust to outstanding international students from outside the United Kingdom. The scholarships are awarded based on academic excellence, leadership potential, and commitment to social change.

scholarship_details.name: Rhodes Scholarships
scholarship_details.amount: Full funding, including tuition fees, college fees, living expenses, and one return airfare
scholarship_details.eligibility: Be a citizen of a country that is a member of the Commonwealth, Have an outstanding academic record, Be committed to making a positive difference in the world
scholarship_details.duration: Full-time for the duration of your course
scholarship_details.application_process: Create an account on the Rhodes House website, Complete the online application form, Upload required documents, including transcripts, CV, and letters of recommendation, Submit your application before the deadline
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Checked the official Rhodes House website, Reviewed the scholarship guidelines, Searched for news and reviews about the scholarship
scholarship_details.verification_notes: The Rhodes Scholarships are highly prestigious scholarships offered by the Rhodes Trust to outstanding international students from Commonwealth countries. The scholarships are awarded based on academic excellence, leadership potential, and commitment to public service.

scholarship_details.name: Schwarzman Scholars Program
scholarship_details.amount: Full funding, including tuition, fees, room and board, health insurance, and a stipend for living expenses
scholarship_details.eligibility: Be a citizen of a country outside of China, Have an outstanding academic record, Be between the ages of 21 and 29, Have at least three years of full-time work experience
scholarship_details.application_process: Create an account on the Schwarzman Scholars website, Complete the online application form, Upload required documents, including transcripts, CV, and letters of recommendation, Submit your application before the deadline
scholarship_details.verification_methods_used: Checked the official Schwarzman Scholars website, Reviewed the scholarship guidelines, Searched for news and reviews about the scholarship
scholarship_details.verification_notes: The Schwarzman Scholars Program is a highly prestigious scholarship offered by the Schwarzman College at Tsinghua University to outstanding international students from outside of China. The scholarships are awarded based on academic excellence, leadership potential, and commitment to public service.
